text.text:
JOHN DOE
Senior Accountant
Mumbai, India | john.doe@email.com | +91-9XXXXXXXXX
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Accountant with over 12 years of experience in financial accounting, auditing, taxation, and regulatory
compliance across manufacturing, IT, and professional services industries. Proven expertise in managing
end-to-end accounting operations, ensuring statutory compliance, and delivering accurate financial insights to
senior leadership. Strong analytical mindset with a track record of improving reporting accuracy, optimizing costs,
and strengthening internal controls.
CORE COMPETENCIES
(cid:127) Financial Accounting & Reporting
(cid:127) Statutory & Internal Audits
(cid:127) Taxation (GST, TDS, Income Tax)
(cid:127) Budgeting & Forecasting
(cid:127) Cost Control & Variance Analysis
(cid:127) Internal Controls & Compliance
(cid:127) ERP Systems: SAP, Oracle, Tally
(cid:127) Advanced Excel & Financial Modelling
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Senior Accountant – ABC Finance Ltd (2018 – Present)
(cid:127) Lead end-to-end accounting operations for a mid-sized organization with annual turnover exceeding INR 250
Crores.
(cid:127) Prepare and review monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements in compliance with IND-AS and statutory
requirements.
(cid:127) Coordinate with external auditors and successfully closed audits with zero major observations for four
consecutive years.
(cid:127) Implemented automated reconciliation processes, reducing month-end close time by 25%.
(cid:127) Partner with senior management to support strategic decision-making through detailed financial analysis and
MIS reporting.

Accountant – XYZ Professional Services (2012 – 2018)
(cid:127) Managed day-to-day accounting operations including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and general ledger
maintenance.
(cid:127) Prepared balance sheets, profit & loss statements, and cash flow statements for multiple client accounts.
(cid:127) Independently handled GST registration, filings, and reconciliations for over 20 clients across different industries.
(cid:127) Assisted in income tax assessments and successfully resolved departmental queries with supporting
documentation.
(cid:127) Improved billing accuracy and reduced revenue leakage by 15% through process standardization.
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS
(cid:127) Reduced audit observations by 40% through strengthened internal controls.
(cid:127) Identified cost-saving opportunities resulting in annual savings of INR 18 Lakhs.
(cid:127) Recognized as “Best Performer – Finance” for two consecutive years.
EDUCATION
(cid:127) Chartered Accountant (CA) – Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI)
(cid:127) Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) – University of Mumbai
CERTIFICATIONS
(cid:127) Certified GST Practitioner
(cid:127) Diploma in IFRS
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
(cid:127) Strong communication and stakeholder management skills
(cid:127) Experience working with cross-functional teams
(cid:127) Willingness to adapt to evolving regulatory environments
